QuestData.Title: The Day that Deathwing Came: The Real Story
QuestData.Description: Not only was Theldurin's story wrong, it was boring, unimaginitive, and slow.$b$bI'll tell you how things really happened on that day.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to Lucien Tosselwrench's version of the story.

Objectives.Objective: Grow large enough to reach the clouds
